title: Weed-Control Machines - Harvest Farm Whately MA

tasks.task: 1. Running a horticultural farm (MAINTASK)

But the initial part of the transcript mentions Gary and Dave grow about 100 acres, so in this breakdown, the maintaining of the farm (MAINTASK) would include all the agricultural practices. The system seems integrated—rotation, herbicide use, and mechanical cultivation.

subtasks: Using tractors and cultivators to clean rows and hill plants.
Managing crop rotation over a three-year period.

Managing weed control on a vegetable farm.

If the aim is to list the physical tasks involved in the farm, which the user indicates in the prompt (given the transcript), then the most comprehensive MAINTASK would be "Operating a vegetable farm," with subtasks as per the breakdown above. That way, all the physical aspects (driving tractors, operating cultivators, applying herbicides, etc.) are captured. Alternatively, if the transcript is about a specific practice, like weed control, then focusing on that.
Cultivating and managing a vegetable crop on a farm.
Maintaining crop health through cultivation and pest control.
But given that rotation and soil management are more strategic, perhaps they can be part of the subtasks under the MAINTASK.
